summary: Embedded HTTP dashboard using native Node.js http module, vanilla HTML/JS, cytoscape.js for graph, vis-timeline for timeline
context: v1.2 milestone planning — adding web dashboard for observability into Twining state
rationale: Serena MCP pattern proven: in-process HTTP server, vanilla frontend, polling updates. Native http module avoids Express dependency. Cytoscape.js (109KB) and vis-timeline (186KB) are mature, zero-framework graph/timeline libraries. No build step required for frontend.

alternatives.reason_rejected: Unnecessary dependency — native http module sufficient for <10 routes
Framework overhead unjustified for read-only dashboard; adds build step
Polling every 2-5s sufficient for local dev tool; WebSockets add connection management complexity
Lower-level API than cytoscape.js; more code for same result in knowledge graph use case
